#-----Solution-----

a = int(input())

i = 1
while (2**i) <= a:
    i += 1

print(i)

a = int(input())

# Initialize the list with the first two values
fib_list = [0, 1]

# Append the next value in the fibonacci sequence until you reach the nth value
while len(fib_list) < a:
    fib_list.append(fib_list[-1] + fib_list[-2])

print(fib_list[-1])
